label.h3: In Trainingland, navigate to the app where you can use the Reporting Rate Summary. Select the Bird District as the organisation unit, the RMNCAH data set and the period as six-monthly July-December 2021. Which organisation units did not complete all of their data sets in a timely fashion?

div.p: The Reporting Rate Summary is available in the Reports app. The Reporting Rate on Time was less than 100% for the Hawk Primary Health Centre, Ostrich Health Centre and Parrot District Hospital, indicating they did not submit their data sets in a timely manner.
